description: Office furniture installation or reconfiguration service
full_summary:
# Office Furniture Tender

## Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Title**: Office Furniture
* **Reference Number**: CB-8-67801381
* **Amendment Number**: 5
* **Solicitation Number**: P2400221

## Tender Details

* **Publication Date**: 2023-12-20
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-01-12 14:00:00 (Expired)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-01-12
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-15

## Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Saskatoon
* **Regions of Delivery**: Edmonton, Saskatoon, and Canada

## Contractor Information

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Parole Board of Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 410 Laurier Avenue West, Ottawa, ON K1A 0R1, Canada

## Tender Description

The Parole Board of Canada is seeking a contractor to provide office furniture, including the ordering, delivery, and installation of five furnished office workstations for the Saskatoon and Edmonton regional offices. The tender is open to qualified suppliers and the selection will be based on the lowest price.

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Gan-Ochir Battumur
* **Contact Email**: procurement@pbc-clcc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: (343) 990-3389

## Tender Documents

The tender documents can be accessed through the Canada Buys website at [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27805/p2400221---srcl.pdf).
